Ectomorph.paragraph: You are naturally light, quick, sensitive, and mentally active. Your body responds fast to change, and so does your mind. You may find it hard to gain weight, and energy may fluctuate.
Ectomorph.commonFeeling: Sometimes my mind is ahead of my body.
Ectomorph.tip: Eat warm, cooked foods and keep a steady meal routine.

Mesomorph.paragraph: You are naturally strong, athletic, and focused. Your digestion is usually good, and your body responds well to routines. You have an inner fire and drive that makes you disciplined.
Mesomorph.commonFeeling: My energy is strong but sometimes overheats.
Mesomorph.tip: Keep meals non-spicy and avoid skipping meals.

Endomorph.paragraph: You are naturally grounded, steady, supportive, and emotionally warm. Your body holds energy well, but sometimes this turns into heaviness.
Endomorph.commonFeeling: I start slow but remain steady.
Endomorph.tip: Start your morning with movement before eating.

Ectomorph.Pitta: You feel light but also driven, sharp, and intense.
Ectomorph.Kapha: You feel light but sometimes get tired easily or feel low energy.

Mesomorph.Vata: You feel strong but also get restless or overstimulated.
Mesomorph.Kapha: You feel strong but also experience heaviness or cravings at times.

Endomorph.Pitta: Heaviness with internal heat, irritation, or acidity.

Vata.paragraph: You are creative, intuitive, imaginative, fast-thinking, and emotionally sensitive. You notice things others miss.

Pitta.paragraph: You are driven, focused, practical, disciplined, and passionate. You like clarity and purpose.
Pitta.tip: Cooling foods calm your inner fire.

Kapha.paragraph: You are nurturing, patient, loyal, kind, and emotionally deep. People trust you quickly.

Vata.Pitta: Creative + sharp â€” beautiful combination but needs cooling.
Vata.Kapha: Creative + steady â€” needs stimulation to avoid stagnation.

Pitta.Vata: Driven + restless â€” powerful but needs grounding.
Pitta.Kapha: Driven + steady â€” powerhouse but needs lightness.

Vata.paragraph: You may feel restless, anxious, overwhelmed, or mentally overactive. Your body may feel cold, sensitive, or irregular.
Vata.quickTip: Warm foods + early dinners + grounding breathwork.
Vata.empathyLine: Your system feels restless and needs grounding.

Pitta.paragraph: You may feel irritated, heated, acidic, impatient, or mentally overdriven.
Pitta.quickTip: Cool down your system â€” avoid spicy food for 48 hours.
Pitta.empathyLine: Your system is heated â€” cool and calm routines will help.

Kapha.paragraph: You may feel heavy, dull, emotionally low, or low on energy.
Kapha.quickTip: Warm water + movement first thing in morning.
Kapha.empathyLine: Your system feels heavy â€” warmth, movement and light foods will help.

Vata-Pitta.paragraph: You may feel restless + irritated together â€” tired but unable to relax.
Vata-Pitta.quickTip: Warm, soft meals; no spicy foods for the next 48 hours.
Vata-Pitta.empathyLine: Restless and heated â€” ground + cool.

Pitta-Vata.paragraph: You may feel overwhelmed + overheated â€” anxious but triggered easily.
Pitta-Vata.quickTip: Cool the body; slow the mind.
Pitta-Vata.empathyLine: Heated and restless â€” cool + ground.

Pitta-Kapha.paragraph: Heat trapped under heaviness â€” frustration mixing with emotional weight.
Pitta-Kapha.empathyLine: Heated and heavy â€” cool + move.

Kapha-Pitta.paragraph: Feeling stuck but irritated; heavy inside and hot inside.
Kapha-Pitta.empathyLine: Heavy and heated â€” move + cool.

Vata-Kapha.paragraph: Restless mind + heavy body â€” wanting to move but unable to start.
Vata-Kapha.empathyLine: Restless yet heavy â€” ground + move.

Kapha-Vata.paragraph: Heavy body + anxious mind â€” emotional weight plus mental restlessness.
Kapha-Vata.empathyLine: Heavy yet restless â€” move + ground.

Balanced.paragraph: Your current Vikriti shows a balanced state, with all three doshas working in harmony. This indicates good overall health and balance in your system. Continue maintaining your current routines, diet, and lifestyle practices that support this equilibrium.
Balanced.quickTip: Maintain your current balanced routines and lifestyle practices.
Balanced.empathyLine: You're well balanced â€” maintain your current routines.

paidPreview.text: To help you heal deeply, I've created a personalized 14-day plan that includes: Food plan â€¢ Movement plan â€¢ Sleep guidance â€¢ Emotional healing ritual â€¢ 24-hour quick fix â€¢ Herb suggestions â€¢ What your body is REALLY trying to tell you
features: What your body is REALLY trying to tell you

B1.title: ðŸŒ¬ Aero Energy Body: "The Lightflow Build"
B1.subtitle: (Pure Aero â€” light frame, fast mind, sensitive digestion)
B1.howYourBodyLives: You have a naturally light frame â€” you may feel the cold more than others and tire faster when routines change. Hunger isn't consistent: some days you forget to eatâ€¦ other days you suddenly realize you're starving. Gas and bloating come when meals are skipped or rushed.
B1.howYourMindMoves: Ideas come faster than you can execute them. Your excitement to begin is highâ€¦ but energy doesn't always stay to finish. You take in a lot â€” sounds, emotions, people's moods â€” and it drains you quietly.
B1.howStressShowsUp: You don't always talk about your stress â€” but your body does: a tight stomach, racing thoughts at night, sudden exhaustion in the day.
dailyAnchors: Warm food â†’ regular digestion
Predictable meal + sleep times â†’ calmer mind
Gentle, grounding movement â†’ steady energy
B1.closingMessage: Your body doesn't need more speed â€” it needs more stability.

B2.title: ðŸŒ¬ðŸ”¥ Aeroâ€“Pyro Energy Body: "The Lightfire Build"
B2.subtitle: (Aero body with Pyro influence â€” fast system, heat under stress)
B2.howYourBodyLives: You have a naturally slim build but sharp features â€” your body responds fast. When life is structured, digestion is strong. But when hunger is delayed or stress rises â†’ acidity, headache or bloating appear.
B2.howYourMindMoves: You want things done properly and quickly. You take on responsibility even when your plate is full. You don't like being slowed down, and you don't let yourself rest easily.
B2.howStressShowsUp: You push through tirednessâ€¦ until irritation comes out suddenly. Your mind gets hot before your body does â€” and then both feel inflamed.
dailyAnchors: Eat before hunger turns sharp
Prefer warm foods but avoid chilli heat
Slow evenings: soft lights, softer conversations
B2.closingMessage: Cooling the mind + grounding the body = your best health.

B3.title: ðŸŒ¬ðŸŒ§ Aeroâ€“Geo Energy Body: "The Lightearth Build"
B3.subtitle: (Aero body with Geo grounding â€” light outside, heavy inside)
B3.howYourBodyLives: Though your frame is light, your body can hold on to weight â€” especially around belly/hips â€” when routine slows. Your digestion prefers warmth and consistent timings.
B3.howYourMindMoves: You appear calmâ€¦ but inside your thoughts move constantly. You often wait for the "right energy" to start something â€” not laziness, just needing emotional readiness.
B3.howStressShowsUp: You withdraw to protect yourself. Food becomes a comfort when life feels heavy. Body slows down; mind keeps spinning. Sleep might be long but not refreshing.
dailyAnchors: Move before breakfast to wake digestion
Smaller dinner, warmer day meals
Warm water every 2â€“3 hours
B3.closingMessage: Your body asks for steady movement; your mind asks for gentleness.

B4.title: ðŸ”¥ Pyro Energy Body: "The Fireform Build"
B4.subtitle: (Pure Pyro â€” strong build, sharp digestion, heat-sensitive)
B4.howYourBodyLives: You are built with strength â€” good muscle tone, clear skin, sharp features. Hunger arrives on time and asks to be respected. When routine slips or meals delay, acidity or heat builds quickly.
B4.howYourMindWorks: You thrive on clarity, purpose, and results. When others are confused, you bring direction. You take ownership naturally â€” sometimes more than necessary.
B4.howStressShowsUp: Stress first shows as irritability or internal heat. You don't like inefficiency or unfairness â€” your mind burns to fix things. Digestive discomfort, headaches, or flushing appear under pressure.
dailyAnchors: Cooling foods: cucumber, coconut, mint
Avoid skipping meals (top trigger for you)
Quiet evening routine to cool the mind + digestion
B4.closingMessage: Your strength is fire â€” protect it from turning into inflammation.

B5.title: ðŸ”¥ðŸŒ¬ Pyroâ€“Aero Energy Body: "The Fireflow Build"
B5.subtitle: (Pyro body with Aero mind â€” strong body, fast mind, burnout-prone)
B5.howYourBodyLives: Athletic frame with active energy. Digestion is strong when calm, but anxiety or rushing causes acidity, gas, or sudden appetite loss.
B5.howYourMindWorks: You're a problem-solver with quick decisions. You think fast, move fast, and expect life to keep up. You push yourself â€” even when tired â€” because you want to finish things perfectly.
B5.howStressShowsUp: You don't slow downâ€¦ until your system forces you to. Sleep gets lighter, energy drops suddenly, and frustration rises. Your nervous system and gut feel every deadline.
earlySignals: Mood goes from calm â†’ explosive
dailyAnchors: Slow meals â€” chew properly
Set a "no work after this time" rule
Avoid intense workouts late evening
B5.closingMessage: Ambition drives you far â€” grounding will help you sustain the journey.

B6.title: ðŸ”¥ðŸŒ§ Pyroâ€“Geo Energy Body: "The Fireearth Build"
B6.subtitle: (Pyro body with Geo stabilizing â€” strength + heaviness cycle)
B6.howYourBodyLives: Your body holds strength and stamina. Hunger is strong â€” sometimes emotional. If meals become heavy or late, digestion slows and acidity or heaviness arrives together.
B6.howYourMindWorks: You are calm until pushed â€” then fierce. You care deeply about people and quality. You protect others, even when you need protection yourself.
B6.howStressShowsUp: You suppress irritation to stay composed â€” it later appears as heartburn, headaches, overthinking, or comfort eating. Heat + heaviness increases in cycles.
earlySignals: Puffy face or fingers in the morning
Desire for sweets during emotional load
dailyAnchors: Warm but non-spicy meals
20â€“30 mins morning movement to lift heaviness
Dinner light + early to reduce night heat
B6.closingMessage: Your steadiness is powerful â€” lighten the load so your fire remains a strength.

B7.title: ðŸŒ§ Geo Energy Body: "The Earthform Build"
B7.subtitle: (Pure Geo â€” grounded, steady, slow metabolism)
B7.howYourBodyLives: Your body is naturally strong and stable. You gain weight easily â€” not because you overeat, but because your system stores energy efficiently. Digestion is slow but steady, and you take time to wake up fully in the morning.
B7.howYourMindWorks: You are calming to be around. You don't hurry decisions â€” you think, feel, consider. You enjoy routine and lasting bonds. Change feels uncomfortable until you trust it.
B7.howStressShowsUp: You internalize first, withdraw later. Stress slows your motivation, and emotions may show as heaviness in the body. Comfort foods become emotional protection.
dailyAnchors: Move before breakfast to wake metabolism
Warm, lightly spiced foods help digestion
Avoid long daytime naps
B7.closingMessage: Your steadiness is your strength â€” just help your energy stay in motion.

B8.title: ðŸŒ§ðŸŒ¬ Geoâ€“Aero Energy Body: "The Earthflow Build"
B8.subtitle: (Geo body with Aero mind â€” heavy body, sensitive mind)
B8.howYourBodyLives: Your frame is strong, but energy is inconsistent â€” some days active, some days heavy. Digestion slows when life gets unpredictable, and bloating or discomfort appears after cold or irregular meals.
B8.howYourMindWorks: You appear calm and patient, but your mind absorbs a lot. You replay conversations, worry about misunderstandings, and sometimes delay important decisions because emotions feel unclear.
B8.howStressShowsUp: When stressed, the mind speeds up while the body slows down. Sleep may be long but not restful. Emotional eating becomes tempting when thoughts get overwhelming.
dailyAnchors: Gentle morning exercise (even 15 min walk)
Warm meals on a steady timing
Reduce screens 30â€“45 mins before sleep
B8.closingMessage: Your body needs motion; your mind needs reassurance. Give both gently.

B9.title: ðŸŒ§ðŸ”¥ Geoâ€“Pyro Energy Body: "The Earthfire Build"
B9.subtitle: (Geo body with Pyro heat â€” strong, warm, emotional storage pattern)
B9.howYourBodyLives: Your body has strength and a reliable appetite. You digest well when calm â€” but stress or heavy meals create both heat and sluggishness. Weight tends to stick, especially with emotional phases.
B9.howYourMindWorks: You are calm on the outside but passionate inside. You care deeply and take responsibility seriously. You want stability, but you also want respect and progress.
B9.howStressShowsUp: You absorb pressure quietly until irritation leaks through. Anger may feel delayed but intense. Body responds with heartburn, headaches, or heavy fatigue.
dailyAnchors: Warm but non-spicy meals
20â€“25 min activity daily â€” morning best
Eat until satisfied, not full
B9.closingMessage: You hold a lot inside â€” let movement and lighter routines carry what your body shouldn't store.

P1.title: ðŸŒ¬ Aero Nature: "The Light Energy Personality"
P1.subtitle: (Pure Aero mindâ€“body nature)
P1.yourNaturalNature: Your mind is always traveling â€” towards ideas, plans, stories, possibilities. You feel the world strongly: sounds, emotions, mood shiftsâ€¦ all affect you immediately.
P1.howYouThinkAndRespond: You're curious and imaginative. Routine feels restricting â€” you thrive in flexibility. You start fast because inspiration pulls you forwardâ€¦ finishing happens when energy supports you.
yourSuperpowers: Adaptability â€” you adjust faster than most
People come to you for ideas and genuine connection.
P1.whenThisGetsTooMuch: If life becomes unstable, your "creative mind" turns into a swirling storm â€” overthinking, anxiety, restlessness, scattered focus.
P1.lifeStageAndSeasonSensitivity: Late nights, winters, and major life transitions amplify Aero-nature â€” you feel more anxious, cold, and mentally drained.
anchors: Predictable routines around food & sleep
One idea at a time â†’ completion first
Slow breathing before bed â†’ calmer sleep
P1.closingMessage: Your imagination is your gift â€” protect the peace it needs to shine.

P2.title: ðŸŒ¬ðŸ”¥ Aeroâ€“Pyro Nature: "The Lightfire Personality"
P2.subtitle: (Fast mind + sharp focus personality)
P2.yourNaturalNature: You're a mix of speed and fire â€” quick to think, quick to decide. You enjoy challenges and set high standards for yourself.
P2.howYouThinkAndRespond: Once you get an idea, you want to execute it immediately. You speak the truth openly â€” sometimes faster than the other person can receive it.
yourSuperpowers: Ability to inspire and push others forward
People rely on your drive â€” you make things happen.
P2.whenThisGetsTooMuch: Your ambition doesn't always wait for your energy. Anxiety + irritability show up when you're doing too much, too fast. You may push through burnout until the body protests.
P2.lifeStageAndSeasonSensitivity: Hot weather and high-pressure phases increase heat + restlessness â†’ short temper / sleeplessness.
anchors: Pause before reacting â€” allow feelings to settle
Cooling foods + calming evening routines
Schedule recovery like you schedule success
P2.closingMessage: Your fire builds futures â€” just don't let it scorch your peace.

P3.title: ðŸŒ¬ðŸŒ§ Aeroâ€“Geo Nature: "The Lightearth Personality"
P3.subtitle: (Sensitive mind + stable emotional core)
P3.yourNaturalNature: You connect with people deeply. You notice what others feel before they say a word. You think long and soft â€” processing through feelings.
P3.howYouThinkAndRespond: You are careful with decisions. You move when it feels right â€” not when rushed. You love comfort, familiarity, and secure bonds.
yourSuperpowers: People trust you because you genuinely care.
P3.whenThisGetsTooMuch: If emotions pile up or stress feels constant, you may withdraw quietly, procrastinate important things, and seek comfort in food or sleep.
P3.lifeStageAndSeasonSensitivity: Cold/damp seasons and emotional upheavals increase heaviness in body + worry in mind.
anchors: Morning movement to lift mood + energy
Express what you feel instead of holding it
Smaller treats; more comforting routines
P3.closingMessage: Your care is powerful â€” give some of it back to yourself.

P4.title: ðŸ”¥ Pyro Nature: "The Fire Energy Personality"
P4.subtitle: (Pure focused, driven, purposeful personality)
P4.yourNaturalNature: You function best where there is clarity and purpose. You dislike chaos, half-truths, and guesswork. When you decide something, you give it your full energy.
P4.howYouThinkAndRespond: You observe situations logically and cut straight to the point. You don't sugarcoat â€” not because you're harsh, but because honesty matters more to you than comfort.
yourSuperpowers: Leadership that makes others feel secure
Courage to stand for what's right
People trust you to get things done correctly.
P4.whenThisGetsTooMuch: Your passion can turn into impatience. When others move slower, frustration rises. Stress creates internal heat â†’ headaches, acidity, irritability.
P4.lifeStageAndSeasonSensitivity: Summer and peak career phases increase intensity â€” passion can overpower balance.
anchors: Cooling activities: moonlight walks, calming music
Eat before hunger becomes urgent
Appreciate small progress â€” not only perfection
P4.closingMessage: Your clarity changes lives â€” let gentleness protect your fire.

P5.title: ðŸ”¥ðŸŒ¬ Pyroâ€“Aero Nature: "The Fireflow Personality"
P5.subtitle: (Driven but fast-thinking, burnout-prone personality)
P5.yourNaturalNature: You see possibilities and chase them quickly. You enjoy a busy schedule â€” it makes you feel alive and useful.
P5.howYouThinkAndRespond: You multitask effortlessly, but at the cost of inner calm. You act as soon as ideas arrive â€” delaying feels suffocating.
yourSuperpowers: People look to you when urgency matters.
P5.whenThisGetsTooMuch: You override your own energy alarms. Anxious thoughts and sleep disturbance creep in. Hunger signals get ignored â†’ leading to acidity or sudden crashes.
P5.lifeStageAndSeasonSensitivity: Hot weather + overwork = irritability + internal heat + nervous tension.
anchors: Prioritize recovery as much as productivity
Soften competition â€” especially with yourself
Warm food, cooled mind â€” daily ritual
P5.closingMessage: Your speed is a gift â€” but rest is what keeps you unstoppable.

P6.title: ðŸ”¥ðŸŒ§ Pyroâ€“Geo Nature: "The Fireearth Personality"
P6.subtitle: (Strong-willed yet emotionally deep personality)
P6.yourNaturalNature: You take responsibility seriously â€” almost personally. You can balance logic and empathy beautifully. You protect people and ideas you value.
P6.howYouThinkAndRespond: Once you commit, you stay. You dislike giving up â€” even when tired or hurt. You don't show weakness easily, even to yourself.
yourSuperpowers: Emotional loyalty â€” relationships bloom with you
Quiet leadership that others trust deeply
People feel safe in your strength.
P6.whenThisGetsTooMuch: Stress gets swallowed, not shared. Frustration builds slowly â†’ turns into heaviness, irritation, emotional eating, or withdrawal.
P6.lifeStageAndSeasonSensitivity: Humidity and long stressful phases increase heaviness in body + heat in mind.
anchors: Move emotions out â€” talk, write, walk
Light dinners + morning movement
Celebrate yourself as much as you support others
P6.closingMessage: You carry others so well â€” remember, you deserve the same support.

P7.title: ðŸŒ§ Geo Nature: "The Earth Energy Personality"
P7.subtitle: (Pure grounded, calm, steady personality)
P7.yourNaturalNature: You move through life with warmth and patience. You value stability â€” in relationships, routines, and environments. People often find comfort just being around you.
P7.howYouThinkAndRespond: You don't rush decisions. You observe, feel, absorbâ€¦ and only act when your heart agrees. You dislike conflict and prefer harmony â€” even if it means compromising occasionally.
yourSuperpowers: Steadiness â€” you don't break easily
People trust you because you're grounded and sincere.
P7.whenThisGetsTooMuch: If emotions build up unexpressed, they turn into heaviness â€” in the body and in thoughts. Motivation dips, cravings rise, and you may withdraw quietly.
P7.lifeStageAndSeasonSensitivity: Cold, damp weather increases sluggishness; emotionally intense periods increase heaviness.
anchors: Daily morning movement â€” even 15 mins
Light, warm meals to energize metabolism
Emotional expression â€” not suppression
P7.closingMessage: Your presence heals others â€” keep yourself light enough to shine.

P8.title: ðŸŒ§ðŸŒ¬ Geoâ€“Aero Nature: "The Earthflow Personality"
P8.subtitle: (Calm outside, sensitive inside personality)
P8.yourNaturalNature: You feel deeply and notice subtleties others miss. You have a quiet wisdom â€” and people often open up to you without asking.
P8.howYouThinkAndRespond: You reflect before reacting. You want emotional clarity before making decisions. Sudden change feels uncomfortable; emotional safety matters more than speed.
yourSuperpowers: People trust you with their feelings.
P8.whenThisGetsTooMuch: You absorb too much â€” others' moods, words, expectations. This creates inner restlessness with outer heaviness. You may overthink, procrastinate, or use food for comfort.
P8.lifeStageAndSeasonSensitivity: Cold/windy seasons increase anxiety; humid seasons increase lethargy.
anchors: Warm routines: meals, showers, tea
Express feelings in small, honest ways
Use gentle movement to release emotional weight
P8.closingMessage: You carry feelings beautifully â€” just don't carry what isn't yours.

P9.title: ðŸŒ§ðŸ”¥ Geoâ€“Pyro Nature: "The Earthfire Personality"
P9.subtitle: (Stable base + inner intensity personality)
P9.yourNaturalNature: You combine strength with compassion. You are dependable â€” when you commit, you commit with your full heart and full discipline.
P9.howYouThinkAndRespond: You prefer clarity and loyalty. You dislike drama and untrustworthy behavior. You lead by example â€” steady, patient, and protective.
yourSuperpowers: People respect you because you mean what you say.
P9.whenThisGetsTooMuch: You may suppress irritation to avoid conflict. This leads to internal heat, emotional buildup. Over time this turns into internal heat (Pitta) plus physical heaviness or stagnation (Kapha) â€” so you can feel both inflamed and weighed down.
P9.lifeStageAndSeasonSensitivity: Sticky, humid seasons and long periods of sustained duty increase heaviness; hot, intense phases amplify your inner fire and impatience.
anchors: Start the day with 20â€“25 min movement â€” it lifts both mood and metabolism
Keep dinners lighter and earlier to reduce night heat and heaviness
Make a short daily check-in (2 minutes) to notice small irritations before they grow
P9.closingMessage: A gentle reminder: your steadiness heals others â€” let small daily choices restore you too.

V0.title: V0 â€” Balanced State
V0.subtitle: (Minimal imbalance)
V0.whatsHappening: Your system is in a relatively balanced state with no significant doshic imbalances detected.
V0.whyFeelingLikeThis: All three doshas are within balanced ranges, indicating good overall health and equilibrium.
V0.earlyWarnings: Continue with healthy routines and lifestyle practices to maintain this balanced state.
V0.closingMessage: You're well balanced â€” maintain your current routines.

V1.title: ðŸŒ¬ Aero Imbalance: "The Overactive Air Pattern"
V1.subtitle: (Excess lightness, anxiety, gas, restlessness)
V1.whatsHappening: Your nervous system is overstimulated. Your thoughts are moving faster than your body can stabilize. This creates irregular digestion, energy fluctuations, and disturbed sleep.
V1.whyFeelingLikeThis: Stress, irregular meals, late nights, or emotional overload have pushed Vata higher than your system can handle. Your body is in "alert mode," even when nothing dangerous is happening.
commonSymptoms: Light, broken sleep or difficulty falling asleep
Feeling cold or shaky when hungry
V1.earlyWarningsTitle: Early Warnings You Should Pay Attention To
V1.earlyWarnings: If Vata stays high, it can trigger: frequent headaches, chronic fatigue, worsening anxiety, IBS-like symptoms.
whatYourBodyNeeds: Warm, cooked meals at regular times
Avoid skipping meals â€” biggest trigger for you
V1.closingMessage: Your system is asking for grounding â€” not speed.

V2.title: ðŸ”¥ Pyro Imbalance: "The Rising Heat Pattern"
V2.subtitle: (Acidity, irritation, sharpness, inflammation)
V2.whatsHappening: Your inner heat is rising faster than your body can cool it. This creates inflammation, acidity, and irritability. Your digestive fire is strong â€” but easily triggered.
V2.whyFeelingLikeThis: Stress, long working hours, poor sleep, spicy/oily food, or pushing yourself too hard have aggravated Pitta. You're running on intensity â€” not balance.
V2.earlyWarningsTitle: Early Warnings You Should Not Ignore
V2.earlyWarnings: Increasing Pitta can lead to: migraines, gastritis, hormonal heat issues, burnout.
whatYourBodyNeeds: Stop late-night screens â€” they spike heat
V2.closingMessage: Your fire is powerful â€” cool it before it burns your calm.

V3.title: ðŸŒ§ Geo Imbalance: "The Heavy Drift Pattern"
V3.subtitle: (Sluggish digestion, low mood, heaviness)
V3.whatsHappening: Your body is moving slower than your mind. Digestion is sluggish, the lymphatic system is congested, and emotional weight is turning into physical heaviness.
V3.whyFeelingLikeThis: Irregular routines, emotional eating, low activity, cold foods, poor sleep, or prolonged stress have elevated Kapha.
commonSymptoms: Slow digestion, feeling full for long
V3.earlyWarningsTitle: Early Warnings to Watch Out For
V3.earlyWarnings: Unmanaged Kapha can lead to: pre-diabetes, thyroid slowing, chronic fatigue, emotional withdrawal.
V3.closingMessage: You don't lack discipline â€” your body just needs momentum.

V4.title: ðŸŒ¬ðŸ”¥ Aeroâ€“Pyro Imbalance: "The Heated Flow Pattern"
V4.subtitle: (Aero dominant â€” nervous + heat combination)
V4.whatsHappening: Your nervous system is overstimulated (Vata high), and your digestive fire is irritated (Pitta high). This creates the classic cycle of: overthinking â†’ acidity â†’ poor sleep â†’ low energy â†’ more overthinking. Your body is trying to run fast while your inner system is overheating.
V4.whyFeelingLikeThis: Irregular meals, high workload, emotional pressure, late nights, or skipping food under stress have pushed both Vata and Pitta up â€” but Vata is leading the imbalance.
V4.earlyWarnings: You may see: IBS-like symptoms, panic episodes, migraines, severe sleep disturbance.
whatYourBodyNeeds: Eat warm meals on time â€” no skipping
Practice 3â€“5 mins deep breathing before sleep
V4.closingMessage: Your system needs rhythm â€” not more pressure.

V5.title: ðŸŒ¬ðŸ”¥ Pyroâ€“Aero Imbalance: "The Overheated Wind Pattern"
V5.subtitle: (Pyro dominant â€” heat + restlessness)
V5.whatsHappening: Your inner fire is running high, creating acidity, heat, irritability, and inflammation-like symptoms. Vata is rising too â€” making your thoughts faster and sleep lighter. You're running on intensity, not stability.
V5.whyFeelingLikeThis: Deadlines, expectations, multitasking, long screen hours, late meals, and self-pressure have overactivated Pitta, and Vata rushed to follow.
commonSymptoms: Acidity + gas at the same time
Heat in face, eyes, or chest
V5.earlyWarnings: Increasing Pitta + Vata can lead to: gastritis, burnout, chronic anxiety, hormonal heat issues.
whatYourBodyNeeds: Reduce intense workouts for a while
Add one calming ritual at night
V5.closingMessage: Your body is asking you to cool down, not slow down.

V6.title: ðŸ”¥ðŸŒ§ Pyroâ€“Geo Imbalance: "The Stagnant Heat Pattern"
V6.subtitle: (Pyro dominant â€” heat + heaviness)
V6.whatsHappening: Your digestive fire is irritated (Pitta high), but your metabolism and lymphatic system have slowed (Kapha high). This creates a "hot on the inside, heavy on the outside" imbalance. You may feel both inflamed and stuck at the same time.
V6.whyFeelingLikeThis: Stress, overeating, heavy meals, sweet cravings, emotional pressure, or lack of movement have pushed Kapha upward â€” while Pitta reacts with heat and irritation.
V6.earlyWarnings: Possibility of: blood sugar fluctuations, hormonal imbalance, chronic inflammation, weight that doesn't move easily.
whatYourBodyNeeds: Light, warm meals â€” low on oil + spice
V6.closingMessage: You don't need to push more â€” you need to release what's weighing you down.

V7.title: ðŸ”¥ðŸŒ§ Geoâ€“Pyro Imbalance: "The Heavy Flame Pattern"
V7.subtitle: (Geo dominant â€” heaviness + internal heat)
V7.whatsHappening: Your body is holding onto heaviness (Kapha high), while your inner fire is still active (Pitta rising). This creates a trapped, uncomfortable mix: tired body + restless heat + emotional overload. Your system feels stuck, yet irritated.
V7.whyFeelingLikeThis: Worrying quietly, eating for comfort, overthinking without expressing emotions, or staying in stressful environments for too long triggers both Kapha and Pitta â€” but Kapha takes the lead.
commonSymptoms: Cravings for sweets or cold foods
Puffiness in face, fingers, or abdomen
Feeling irritated but not wanting conflict
V7.earlyWarnings: This imbalance can push toward: low thyroid symptoms, stubborn weight gain, hormonal stagnation, emotional withdrawal.
whatYourBodyNeeds: 20â€“25 mins daily movement to release heaviness
Warm, light meals â€” avoid cold, creamy, heavy foods
Talk out emotions instead of storing them
V7.closingMessage: Your body is asking you to lighten the load you've been carrying quietly.

V8.title: ðŸŒ¬ðŸŒ§ Aeroâ€“Geo Imbalance: "The Coldâ€“Damp Flow Pattern"
V8.subtitle: (Aero dominant â€” dryness + heaviness mix)
V8.whatsHappening: Your mind is overstimulated (Vata high), but your body is moving slow (Kapha elevated). This creates a frustrating mismatch: you want to act, but your body doesn't move. Stress increases restlessness, and routine slows the body even more.
V8.whyFeelingLikeThis: Irregular lifestyle, emotional holding, long sitting hours, cold meals, and overthinking have simultaneously raised Vata and Kapha â€” Vata faster.
commonSymptoms: Unrefreshing sleep (sleeping long but waking tired)
V8.earlyWarnings: This pattern can lead to: chronic fatigue, emotional instability, digestive weakness, cycles of withdrawal + burnout.
whatYourBodyNeeds: Gentle morning movement to wake both body & mind
Break tasks into small steps â€” start slow but start
V8.closingMessage: Your mind wants motion; your body needs rhythm. Meet them halfway.

V9.whatsHappening: Your body is slowing down (Geo high) while your mind holds quiet worry (Vata rising). You may look calm, but internally feel unsettled or emotionally overloaded. This creates low energy + low motivation + quiet tension.
V9.whyFeelingLikeThis: Emotional suppression, long periods of inactivity, cold foods, oversleeping, irregular routines, or carrying responsibilities silently can raise Kapha â€” with Vata rising through worry.
V9.earlyWarnings: Long-term imbalance may lead to: weight gain, emotional dullness, lowered metabolism, anxiety episodes, sleep disturbances.
whatYourBodyNeeds: Avoid emotional eating â€” choose warm, light meals
Talk to someone you trust â€” don't carry everything silently
V9.closingMessage: You've been holding too much alone â€” let movement and warmth help you release.
